mapper.select: select * from coupon where active is TRUE and deleted is FALSE and ((total_count is null or total_count = 0) or (total_count > issued_count)) and ((start_time is null or end_time is null) or (now() between start_time and end_time));

SELECT c.*, IFNULL(temp.expected_amount, 0) AS expected_amount, IFNULL(temp.actual_amount, 0) AS actual_amount FROM coupon c LEFT JOIN (SELECT t.coupon_id, SUM( t.expected_interest + t.default_interest - t.expected_fee ) AS expected_amount, SUM( t.actual_interest + t.default_interest - t.actual_fee ) AS actual_amount FROM user_coupon t GROUP BY t.coupon_id) temp ON c.id = temp.coupon_id where c.coupon_type in ('NEWBIE_COUPON','INVEST_COUPON') and c.user_group != 'EXCHANGER' ORDER BY created_time DESC LIMIT #{index},#{pageSize}
